title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8038.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8038.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 90. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 90 between the Albany-Rensselaer
county line and the Rensselaer-Columbia county line in the City of Rensselaer
and Towns of North Greenbush, East Greenbush and Schodack. (b) The Berkshire Connection. The eastbound
and westbound roadways of the Berkshire Connection between the

Albany-Rensselaer county line and exit B1 on IR 90 in the Town of

Schodack. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8038.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
